Question.Subject: Really Slow Internet?
Question.Content: Internet was working fine 2 days ago then all of a sudden it got reallly slow Dont know why Thanks Sam but yeah tried that.. Thanks Sam but yeah tried that..
Question.ChosenAnswer: Unplug the modem, wait 30-60 seconds, and plug it back in.

Answer.Content: Unplug the modem, wait 30-60 seconds, and plug it back in.

Perhaps, your pc infected spyware/trojan, you can try another software to remove it. http://toptenantispyware.com Registry problem Lots of things get saved on your PC that you don't need. Some are benign. Some slow you down. And some let prying eyes track what you do on your PC. install Registry cleaner and run daily. http://toptenantispyware.com/Clean_Up_Center.htm

If your PC is running slow and you want to make it faster, I recommend you to check your pc heath online first, then you can know why it is slow and fix easily..
Recommended website: http://slowpc-checking.com/Slow_PC
